Package com.ulflander.minethat.job

Model and utilities for jobs.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Job A job holds informations about documents to be processed, processors to run on them or presets of processors to use, and also about the customer that initiated the job.
JobDocument Document that is part of a job.
JobExecutor Executes a job: check customer key, run processors on all documents.
JobFactory JobFactory class creates a Job instance from multiple kind of objects: String, Email, File...
JobProcessor A Processor representation as for a job.
JobProcessorOption Options for a processor.
JobStorage Store and retrieve jobs from MongoDB.
 

Enum Summary
JobDocumentType Job document type - defines what value of JobDocument is: a file, an URL, a raw string...
JobGateway List of available job gateways.
JobStatus Status for job executions.
 

Package com.ulflander.minethat.job Description

Model and utilities for jobs.

Since:
2/24/14
